content.question: What is an automatic stabilizer?

choices.label: It is a program or policy that counteracts the business cycle with discretionary fiscal policy.
It is a program or policy that counteracts the business cycle without any new government action required.
It is a tax or spending program that is enacted to balance the federal budget.
It is the change in consumption spending resulting from a given change in disposable income.
It is a part of a market economic system that ensures that markets achieve equilibrium in the long run.

content.answer: It is a program or policy that counteracts the business cycle without any new government action required.
